sentences.sentence: To use the other side of the double-ended nail appliques, carefully break away the silver TAB.
sentences.translation: 从合适你指甲的纯甲油膜末端轻轻的揭掉银色部分。

sentences.sentence: Trims include buttons, lace edging, appliques, embroidery. Great variety in designs can be achieved through varying the detail.
sentences.translation: 钮扣边、花带边、嵌花边以及刺绣边。通过改变细部结构，可以得到变化无穷的多种设计。

sentences.sentence: Other things that you can enjoy are the industrial chandeliers, ironwork appliques and lamps strategically used to exalt every minimum specifics.
sentences.translation: 在此，你还可以享受的东西就是工业吊灯、铁工贴花和灯具。它们都被精心安排在最精巧的细节之中。
